name: Rare Mags
description: Independent magazine and book shop based in Stockport, UK. Selling books, prints, magazines and cards from local and global publishers along with homeware
safetyTips: Rare Mags is now open with one person (or family group) at a time in the shop. Please use the hand sanitiser by the door, wear a mask if you can, and consider those queuing outside while you browse.
